2:

Text: What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank:  The title of the collection takes influence from Raymond Carver's 1981 short story collection "What We Talk About When We Talk About Love."
Triplets:<What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank
3:
--------------------
Text: What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank:  It was a finalist for the Pulitzer Prize for Fiction, losing to Adam Johnson's "The Orphan Master's Son".
Triplets:<What We Talk About When We Talk About Anne Frank
